channel.title: Help with not being able to log out
channel.description:
ok well on devolution i am adding new saves in character file thing and there are no errors but when i log in and then try to log out it doesn't let me and a bunch of error things pop up
[code]Devolution Server 7.0 - Created by Winten/Bakatool ------------------------------------------------------- Loading npcs... drops... spawn list...done! Connection from localhost:3067 Jmood14: character file not found. [client-1-Jmood14]: ab=9154 java.lang.StringIndexOutOfBoundsException: String index out of range: 25 at java.lang.String.getChars(Unknown Source) at java.io.BufferedWriter.write(Unknown Source) at client.savegame(client.java:16330) at client.logout(client.java:8303) at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:13227) at client.process(client.java:14392) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:283) at process.run(process.java:23) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Devolution [fatal] - exception Error with player 1, Jmood14 java.lang.StringIndexOutOfBoundsException: String index out of range: 25 at java.lang.String.getChars(Unknown Source) at java.io.BufferedWriter.write(Unknown Source) at client.savegame(client.java:16330) at client.process(client.java:14399) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:283) at process.run(process.java:23) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [client-1-Jmood14]: ab=107062 [client-1-Jmood14]: Case 185: Action Button: 107062 [client-1-Jmood14]: Unhandled packet [149, InterFaceId: 27582, size=0]: ][ [client-1-Jmood14]: Action Button: 0 [/code]
and now it just says that a bunch of times and i have to exit out of the rune.bat does anyone one how to fix this?

item.title: Help with not being able to log out
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

Have you tried pressing the logout button? This works 99% of the time.

Read full topic
item.source: Help with not being able to log out

ty jc22493 i fixed it i had it to high
rep ++

EDIT: nvm on the rep but ty and a mod can lock if they what

item.title: Help with not being able to log out
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

There is an index that is either larger or smaller than the specified size of the string.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with not being able to log out
item.dc:creator: @shayd3e shayd3e
item.description:
@shayd3e wrote:

if you set it to false it wont let you log out
what he meant was that change the falso from true…

Read full topic

item.description:

so if i set it to false it will let me log out and not have the error on log out? or is that not the big problem?

item.title: Help with not being able to log out
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

ok well on devolution i am adding new saves in character file thing and there are no errors but when i log in and then try to log out it doesn’t let me and a bunch of error things pop up

[code]Devolution Server 7.0 - Created by Winten/Bakatool

Loading npcs… drops… spawn list…done!
Connection from localhost:3067
Jmood14: character file not found.
[client-1-Jmood14]: ab=9154
java.lang.StringIndexOutOfBoundsException: String index out of range: 25
at java.lang.String.getChars(Unknown Source)
at java.io.BufferedWriter.write(Unknown Source)
at client.savegame(client.java:16330)
at client.logout(client.java:8303)
at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:13227)
at client.process(client.java:14392)
at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:283)
at process.run(process.java:23)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
Devolution [fatal] - exception
Error with player 1, Jmood14
java.lang.StringIndexOutOfBoundsException: String index out of range: 25
at java.lang.String.getChars(Unknown Source)
at java.io.BufferedWriter.write(Unknown Source)
at client.savegame(client.java:16330)

[client-1-Jmood14]: Unhandled packet [149, InterFaceId: 27582, size=0]: ][

[/code]

and now it just says that a bunch of times and i have to exit out of the rune.bat
does anyone one how to fix this?
